info.name: Numark NS6II
info.author: Swiftb0y
info.description: Mapping for the Numark NS6II controller. It is able to fully communicate with the integrated screens. You can manipulate the Beatgrid of the track via the slicer pad page (since mixxx doesn't have slicer capabilities)
info.wiki: Encoded URL to Mixxx wiki page documenting this controller mapping
